summary: A simple follower mod named Spot.
descriptionHtml:
Spot is a combat barbarian, that comes without any armor or weaponry. He is built to wear light armor, proficient with all weapon types, except magicka. 

He is essential and capable of being married. He levels with you, too.

He can use one low level healing spell to heal himself. 

Speed increase 25% so he doesn\'t get left behind.

Located in the Alchemist\'s Shack (see map picture), and may be found tinkering in the area around the shack.

He is a standalone follower mod.

This is a working BETA and direct support is not available. 

Check out my other mods:
Snowflake Mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24849
Kenzie Mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24821
Faren Mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24754
Conrad Mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24755
author: Faren Russell
